name: The Endless War of Kenney and Mr Simplicity
name_original: The Endless War of Kenney and Mr Simplicity
description:
This game is made for the Dev League Round 2 with the theme: Unbeatable.

You play as an airplane supporting team Kenney, against the evil and malicious Simple Circle who desires the world to be simple. The war against two sides with different ideals: simplicity and complexity. A war that shall never end. A war... that is unbeatable for both sides.

You cannot beat this game. You cannot be beaten and the enemy is unbeatable.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys to move

Left Mouse Button to shoot

Escape to return back to menu

Assets made by Kenney: https://kenney.nl/assets/pixel-shmup
